-- Create database master key 
-- password is used to encrypt the credentials
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='mypasswordis@complex123'


--create database scoped credentials 
Create Database SCOPED CREDENTIAL externaltable_credential
with IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'


-- create external data source Silver and provide url of silver container. 
create external data source source_silver
with 
(
    LOCATION = 'https://airbnbstoreacc.blob.core.windows.net/silver',
CREDENTIAL = externaltable_credential
)


-- create external data source Gold and provide url of gold container . 
create external data source source_gold
with 
(
    LOCATION = 'https://airbnbstoreacc.blob.core.windows.net/gold',
CREDENTIAL = externaltable_credential
)


--create external file format so synapse can read the format of the files.
-- data compression tells synapse the compression method used inside parquet file
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)


--Now Create external table
-- this will create an external table in gold container.

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.airbnbextenal
with(
    LOCATION = 'airbnbexternal',
    DATA_SOURCE = source_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet

) 
AS
select * from Gold.airbnb_view

/* Connect airbnb external table to powerbi and build visualizations*/
